onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.PutBackOnCha.translation: Please put Cozmo back on the charger

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message1.translation:
You're connected to your Cozmo, and he's almost ready!
He just needs a moment to charge.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message2.translation:
Once he's done charging, let Cozmo come to life
and learn about his new home.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message3.translation:
Cozmo comes with Upgrades that you can unlock.
Each one gives him a new ability that he'll do on his own.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message4.translation:
You can pick up Cozmo if you need to,
but he's happiest when he can drive on his own.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message5.translation:
When you're not playing games with Cozmo,
it's great to sit back and watch him explore the world.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.finalMessage.translation:
Cozmo is ready to play. To completely charge his battery,
you can keep him on the charger for another 7 minutes.

onboarding.Slide2.translation:
Cozmo is a very special robot who needs a caring owner

 Follow the instructions carefully!

onboarding.Phase3.Header1.translation: Place a Power Cube in front of Cozmo

onboarding.Phase3.Body1.translation: It will turn <color=cyan>blue</color> when he can see it

onboarding.Phase3.Body2.translation: Great! Just like you, if the Cube is too close it's hard to see.

onboarding.Phase3.Header3.translation: He'll tell you when he's ready to proceed...

onboarding.Phase3.Body3.translation: Let Cozmo inspect the Cube on his own

onboarding.Phase3.Body4.translation:
Well done!
Cozmo is ready to play!

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorCozmo.translation: Tutorial Paused Cozmo needs to be on a stable, flat, surface and to explore on his own.

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorFinal.translation: Having Trouble? Make sure Cozmo is on a flat, clean table. Cozmo may struggle on glass surfaces. If you're still having issues, visit support.anki.com on another device.

onboarding.Slide0a.translation: Put Cozmo on a clean, open table in a well lit room

onboarding.GreatPlaySpace2Footer.translation: Cozmo will try to avoid falling, but just like a pet, he might need your help.

onboarding.OldRobotSkip.translation: This Cozmo has already been through the Tutorial. Would you like to Skip it, or Start it again?

onboarding.MeetCozmoIntro.translation: Cozmo Would like to meet you!

onboarding.NeedsIntro.translation:
Cozmo has needs.

Take care of him each day to earn new games and abilities

onboarding.NeedsIntroReturning.translation:
Cozmo has Needs.

Take car of him each day to unlock new games and abilities.

Cozmo's app may look a little different but you'll keep your progress of any unlocked games, upgrades, and sparks.

onboarding.PlayIntro.translation: Fill Cozmo’s Play Need each day to earn a Daily Bonus Token.

onboarding.RewardsIntro.translation:
You’ve earned a Daily Bonus Token by filling Cozmo’s Play Need!
Tokens unlock Bonus Boxes, filled with rewards such as sparks and new abilities!

onboarding.ActivitiesIntro.translation: These are special activities that don’t affect Cozmo’s needs or sparks!
